Challenges in Public Procurement textual data
1.1. Tender Drafting
22
Problem 1: Imprecision
The wording of the tenders may present imprecisions that 
are difficult to manage.  
•
Imprecise words, such as "solvency", are frequently 
used without being clear what they imply. 
Possible Solutions
•
Detect the worst written parts of existing tenders and create a taxonomy of the 
worst errors. Words that tend to be imprecise, such as "solvency", could be 
detected.
•
A style recommender could also be generated on the basis of correct tenders. 
•
A metric could be designed to measure the clarity and readability.
1

drafts the tender
Main problem here is the need of annotations and expert knowledge to
